## Summary
Briefly describe your changes.

## Type of PR
- [ ] New Game
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] Documentation Update
- [ ] Other

## Related Issue
Link the issue this PR closes (if any): #  

## Files Added / Changed
- [ ] index.html
- [ ] style.css
- [ ] script.js
- [ ] Other files: specify

## Screenshot  
Add screenshot of change(s) if applicable  

## Additional Notes
Provide any extra information or context.
